title: Bug 130068 - Report Parameter window does not open when previewing a report with a parameter
description:
Description: When previewing a report with a parameter, the Report Parameter window does not open as expected.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter without a default value.
2. Drag the parameter to the report layout.
3. Preview the report and observe that the Report Parameter window does not open.
OB: When previewing a report with a parameter, the Report Parameter window should open to allow users to input parameter values.
EB: When previewing a report with a parameter, the Report Parameter window does not open as expected, preventing users from inputting parameter values.
SR: Ensure that the Report Parameter window opens when previewing a report with a parameter, allowing users to input parameter values.
